page.title: 09Recreation.
page.content: Although there are few amenities in this area apart from one small outdoor heated swimming pool owned by a private hotel but open to the public the residents take advantage of the facilities surrounding them. Many of these concern the sea and include angling,boating,sailing and swimming. There is a sailing club for dinghies, a yacht club and an underwater centre (diving being a very popular pastime). Windsurfing is also very popular. There is also a large following for gig racing (the racing of six_oared pilot gigs). Other facilities near by include a 9 hole golf course,one squash court and one tennis court. Cricket,football and Hockey are also played.There is a diffculty in finding different competition and most events depend on the residents competing against each other.
